import re

def extractAndCleanAnchorTags(html):
    pattern = ''
    matches = re.findall(pattern, html)
    cleaned_text = [match.replace('‌', '') for match in matches]
    return cleaned_text
import re def extractAndCleanAnchorTags(html): pattern = ']*>(.*?)' matches = re.findall(pattern, html) cleaned_text = [match.replace('', '') for match in matches] return cleaned_text
import re def extractAndCleanAnchorTags(html): pattern = ']*>(.*?)' matches = re.findall(pattern, html) cleaned_text = [match.replace('‌', 'MUTATED') for match in matches] return cleaned_text
